entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow at times late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few clouds. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
